ValidationRule.description: User will not be able to update information on a closed opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF( AND( RecordType.Id = LEFT($Label.PNG_OpprtunityRecordTypeId,15) , (PRIORVALUE(IsClosed)),True,False)
&& $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "PNG - Billing/Legal" && $Profile.Name <> "PNG - Sales Operations"
&& ((ISCHANGED(ContractAttached__c)=TRUE) || (ISCHANGED(ContractAttached__c)=FALSE)), TRUE , FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This opportunity is closed and locked
